00020 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00029 
00030 #ifndef __TLM_HELPERS_H__
00031 #define __TLM_HELPERS_H__
00032 
00033 //#include <sys/param.h>
00034 //#include <cstring>
00035 
00036 namespace tlm {
00037 
00038 enum tlm_endianness { TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN, TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN, TLM_BIG_ENDIAN };
00039 
00040 inline tlm_endianness get_host_endianness(void)
00041 {
00042   static tlm_endianness host_endianness = TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN;
00043   
00044   if (host_endianness == TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN) {
00045     unsigned int number = 1;
00046     unsigned char *p_msb_or_lsb = (unsigned char*)&number;
00047 
00048     host_endianness = (p_msb_or_lsb[0] == 0) ? TLM_BIG_ENDIAN : TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00049   }
00050   return host_endianness;
00051 }
00052 
00053 inline bool host_has_little_endianness(void)
00054 {
00055   static tlm_endianness host_endianness = TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN;
00056   static bool host_little_endian = false;
00057   
00058   if (host_endianness == TLM_UNKNOWN_ENDIAN) {
00059     unsigned int number = 1;
00060     unsigned char *p_msb_or_lsb = (unsigned char*)&number;
00061 
00062     host_little_endian = (p_msb_or_lsb[0] == 0) ? false : true;
00063   }
00064 
00065   return host_little_endian;
00066 }
00067 
00068 inline bool has_host_endianness(tlm_endianness endianness)
00069 {
00070   if (host_has_little_endianness()) {
00071     return endianness == TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00072 
00073   } else {
00074     return endianness == TLM_BIG_ENDIAN;
00075   }
00076 } 
00077 
00078 } // namespace tlm
00079 
00080 #endif /* __TLM_HELPERS_H__ */
